data.prayer: Jesus, 12,700 people live in the county of Samba. Please, give them 2 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 12,406 lost people in  Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput Awan people.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 12,560 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, help the 140 believers in Samba to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Samba, Jammu and Kashmir, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

location.name: Samba
location.people_groups_list: Bazigar (Muslim traditions), Seok, Gaddi (Muslim traditions), Lama, Budhan (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bazigar (Muslim traditions) (7,300), Seok (1,700), Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000), Lama (600), Budhan (Hindu traditions) (100)
